name: nemp
description: Never Forget Memory Plugin - Persistent long-term memory for Claude Code across sessions and projects

commands.name: save
commands.description: Save a key-value memory entry to persistent storage

commands.name: recall
commands.description: Retrieve a memory by key or search query

commands.name: save-global
commands.description: Save a memory globally across all projects

commands.name: auto-capture
commands.description: Enable or disable automatic memory capture

commands.name: init
commands.description: Auto-detect project stack and save as memories
